basic.description:
An introduction to the orchestral strings through class instruction. Fundamental playing techniques will be emphasized. Includes the study of ranges, fingerings, bowings, transpositions, tunings, basic instrument maintenance, method books and teaching techniques. Rental instruments available. 
NOTE    Enrolment is limited to students in a MUSC Plan or the B.Mus. Program.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: String Techniques and Methods I
